categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: ES-03 was the designation of a human male of the Galactic Empire who was recruited early in its foundation by Vice Admiral Rampart. ES-03, along with his squad-mates, was described by Rampart as one of the best soldiers in the galaxy, and was brought into the Elite Squad under the leadership of Clone Commander CT-9904.
ES-03 first appeared the television series Star Wars: The Bad Batch, voiced by Ness Bautista.
